item.title: Build_own_blog
item.description: user the ‘hugo’ cli by building yourself Blog // Microsoft Windows [版本 10.0.22621.1992] (c) Microsoft Corporation。保留所有权利。 D:\BLOG>hugo new site blog Congratulations! Your new Hugo site is created in D:\BLOG\blog. Just a few more steps and you're ready to go: 1. Download a theme into the same-named folder. Choose a theme from https://themes.gohugo.io/ or create your own with the "hugo new theme <THEMENAME>" command. 2. Perhaps you want to add some content.
